meanings.sent1: The humbuggery of the con artist fooled many people.
meanings.sent2: The politician's humbuggery was exposed by investigative journalists.
meanings.sent3: The magician's humbuggery made the audience gasp in surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her smile hid the humbuggery of her intentions.
meanings.sent5: The detective unraveled the humbuggery of the criminal's alibi.

meanings.sent1: Don't believe the humbuggery spouted by that charlatan.
meanings.sent2: The children saw through the humbuggery of the prankster's story.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's humbuggery had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The advertisement was full of humbuggery to attract customers.
meanings.sent5: The old man warned the young ones about the dangers of falling for humbuggery.
